action.action-desc: Mr. Wenstrup introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to consolidate certain eligibility tiers under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Guard and Reservists Education Improvement Act.

section.header: Consolidation of certain eligibility tiers under Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 3311(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (6)(A), by striking 12 months and inserting 6 months;
by redesignating paragraphs (8) and (9) as paragraphs (7) and (8), respectively.

subsection.text: Section 3313(c) of such title is amended by striking paragraph (7).
Sections 3311, 3313, 3316, 3322, and 3679 of such title are further amended—
